= Introduction =

Given a target gene, identify genes encoding for antibiotic targets in its chromosomal neighborhood of +/- 10 genes. 

As an example, we will use gene [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene/934804 spr0328] (GeneId: 934804) from [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=Info&id=171101&lvl=3&lin=f&keep=1&srchmode=1&unlock Streptococcus pneumoniae R6] which encodes for [http://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/Q8DR60 Endo-alpha-N-acetylgalactosaminidase (Q8DR60)].

The Java Code for this example is [https://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/main/java/org/jbiowh/tools/examples/AntibioticGeneNeighbors.java here]

Go to a CMD Windows console or a linux console to execute the java code: 

<code language="bash">
java -cp <path-to the-jbiowh-jar-file> org.jbiowh.tools.examples.AntibioticGeneNeighbors -n 10 -geneId 934804
</code>


= Details =

The result shows the gene [http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gene/934791 934791] that encodes for protein [http://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/Q8DR59 Q8DR59] which is an antibiotic target for [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB00713 Oxacillin], [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB00739 Hetacillin], [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB00607 Nafcillin], [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB00415 Ampicillin], [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB00456 Cefalotin], [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB08795 Azidocillin], [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB00493 Cefotaxime], [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB01331 Cefoxitin] and [http://www.drugbank.ca/drugs/DB00567 Cephalexin]
